titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish fairness in the treatment of certain pension plans maintained by churches, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish fairness in the treatment of certain pension plans maintained by churches, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt: (1) participants in church pension plans who are not highly compensated employees from certain defined benefit plan limitations; and (2) church-maintained retirement income accounts from the tax on unrelated debt-financed income from real property interests.
